stats.reactions: Reactions: Determines turn order and initiative rolls. Higher is better.
stats.speed: Speed: How many spaces a character can move with a standard Move action.
stats.combat: Combat: A bonus added to all shooting and brawling rolls.
stats.toughness: Toughness: The target number to beat on a damage roll to avoid a lethal hit.
stats.savvy: Savvy: A general measure of intelligence and technical skill.
stats.luck: Luck: Can be spent to negate a hit. A valuable life-saving resource.

traits.melee: Melee: Provides a +2 bonus in brawling combat.
traits.pistol: Pistol: Can be used in brawling with a +1 bonus.
traits.critical: Critical: Scores an additional hit on a roll of 6.
traits.elegant: Elegant: Allows rerolling a failed brawling roll if this weapon was used.
traits.clumsy: Clumsy: Suffers a penalty in brawling against faster opponents.
traits.focused: Focused: All shots from a single action must target the same character.
traits.terrifying: Terrifying: On a hit, forces the target to become Panicked.
traits.area: Area: After resolving the initial attack, may hit other figures near the target.
traits.single_use: Single-Use: This weapon is discarded after one use.
traits.heavy: Heavy: Firing this weapon after moving incurs a -1 penalty.
traits.snap_shot: Snap Shot: Grants a +1 bonus to shooting rolls at targets within 6 spaces.
traits.impact: Impact: Applies an extra Stun marker on a non-lethal hit.
traits.hulkerShooting: Hulker's Combat Skill is always +0 when shooting.

devices.battle_dress: A full suit of powered armor. Grants +1 Reactions (max 4) and a 5+ save.
devices.camo_cloak: Grants cover if within 2 spaces of terrain and more than 4 spaces from the shooter.
devices.combat_armor: Standard issue armor, providing a 5+ save against lethal hits.
devices.deflector_field: Once per battle, can completely negate one ranged hit.
devices.flak_screen: Reduces damage from Area weapons by 1.
devices.flex_armor: Grants +1 Toughness if the wearer has not moved this turn.
devices.frag_vest: A basic armored vest. Provides a 6+ save, improved to 5+ against Area weapons.
devices.screen_generator: A personal energy screen. Provides a 5+ save against non-Area ranged attacks.
devices.stealth_gear: Imposes a -1 penalty on enemies shooting at the wearer from more than 9 spaces away.

gun_mods.assault_blade: Gains Melee trait, +1 Damage, and wins brawls on a draw. (Non-Pistol only)
gun_mods.beam_light: In reduced visibility, increase visibility by +3 spaces.
gun_mods.bipod: +1 to Hit at ranges > 8 spaces when Aiming or firing from Cover. (Non-Pistol only)
gun_mods.hot_shot_pack: +1 Damage for specific laser/blast weapons. A natural 6 on the shooting roll renders the weapon inoperable for the battle.
gun_mods.shock_attachment: Gains Impact trait against targets within 8 spaces.

statuses.stunned: Stunned: Can only perform one action per turn. Recovers 1 stun token at the end of their turn.
statuses.dazed: Dazed: Cannot perform any actions. Recovers at the end of the round.
statuses.panicked: Panicked: Must use their turn to flee from the source of the effect.
statuses.engaged: Engaged: Adjacent to an enemy. Can only perform Brawl actions against adjacent enemies.

actions.move: Move (1 Action): Move up to the character's Speed in spaces. Cannot take an Aimed Shot after moving.
actions.dash: Dash (1 Action): Move up to Speed + 2 spaces. Prevents any combat actions this turn.
actions.slide: Slide (1 Action): A risky Dash on the ice. Move 1D6" in a straight line. Collisions cause stuns.
actions.snapShot: Snap Shot (1 Action): A standard ranged attack. Can be performed after moving.
actions.aimedShot: Aimed Shot (2 Actions): A more accurate ranged attack that rerolls a 1. Cannot be performed after moving.
actions.panicFire: Panic Fire (All Actions): Fire +2 shots at half range. Each shot targets the closest valid enemy. Weapon becomes inoperable for the battle.
actions.brawl: Brawl (1 Action): A close-quarters combat attack against an adjacent enemy.
actions.interact: Interact (1 Action): Use this action to complete mission objectives like accessing consoles or picking up items. Prevents other combat actions this turn.
actions.useConsumable: Use Consumable (Free Action for first use, 1 Action for second).
actions.finalizeTasksFirst: You must finalize your crew's tasks for the turn before taking on a mission or advancing.
actions.insufficientFuelDetailed: Not enough credits for fuel. Total cost: {total}cr (Requires {credits}cr + {fuel} from fuel credits).
actions.emergencyTakeoff: Warning: The ship is damaged! An emergency take-off is risky and will cause further hull damage (3D6).
actions.componentPurchased: You have already purchased a ship component this turn.
actions.redZoneRequirements: Requires: Turn > 10, Crew >= 7, 15 Credits for license.
actions.teleport: Teleport (1 Action): Move up to 1D6 spaces, ignoring terrain and other characters.
actions.nullZone: Teleportation is disabled in this Null Zone.
actions.mustBrawl: This K'Erin must move to engage an enemy in a brawl.
actions.showWeaponRange: Show this weapon's range and Line of Sight.
actions.brawlWeaponNoRange: This is a brawl-only weapon and has no range.
actions.concealedBlade: Concealed Blade (Free Action): If starting your turn within 2" of an enemy, make a free ranged attack with this blade. Once per battle.
actions.timeDistorter: Time Distorter (Free Action): Freeze up to 3 enemies in time. They will be unable to act until the end of the next round. Once per battle.
actions.displacer: Displacer (1 Move Action): Teleport 1D6" in a random direction. Once per battle.
actions.distractionBot: Distraction Bot (1 Combat Action): Target an enemy within 12". They will be unable to act on their next turn. Once per battle.

ship_traits.emergency_drives: If you perform an emergency take-off while damaged, reduce Hull damage by 3.
ship_traits.fuel_efficient: Fuel cost for traveling to a new world is reduced by 1 credit.
ship_traits.fuel_hog: Fuel cost for traveling to a new world is increased by 1 credit.
ship_traits.standard_issue: The cost of all Starship Components is reduced by 1 credit.
ship_traits.dodgy_drive: When the ship takes Hull damage, roll 2D6. If the roll is <= damage sustained, take 2 additional damage.
ship_traits.armored: When the ship takes damage, lose 1 less Hull Point than indicated.

on_board_items.analyzer: Adds +1 to Exploration and Trade rolls.
on_board_items.colonist_ration_packs: May be expended during the Upkeep phase to waive the crew's upkeep cost. Single use.
on_board_items.duplicator: Can be used to duplicate a single consumable item. Single use.
on_board_items.fake_id: Ignore the first Rival gained from a law enforcement source.
on_board_items.fixer: Can be used to find a buyer for illegal goods, gaining 2D6 credits. Single use.
on_board_items.genetic_reconfiguration_kit: Reduces a stat upgrade cost by 2 XP (once per character). Single use.
on_board_items.genetic_reconfiguration_kit_active: Genetic Kit bonus is active for this character's next stat upgrade.
on_board_items.loaded_dice: Once per turn, may have a crew member re-roll any die.
on_board_items.lucky_dice: Once per turn, may have a crew member re-roll a Luck die.
on_board_items.mk_II_translator: Increases the chance of finding a patron.
on_board_items.med-patch: May be expended during Upkeep to reduce an injury's recovery time by 1 turn. Single use.
on_board_items.meditation_orb: Allows one crew member to re-roll a Panic check once per battle. Single use.
on_board_items.military_fuel_cell: A high-efficiency fuel cell. When used, it covers the entire cost of traveling to a new system. Single-use.
on_board_items.nano-doc: May be expended after a battle to completely ignore an injury roll result for one crew member. Single use.
on_board_items.novelty_stuffed_animal: Can be given to a Disgruntled crew member during Upkeep to remove the status. Single use.
on_board_items.purifier: Provides the crew with clean water. Avoids some negative events on wasteland worlds.
on_board_items.repair_bot: Automatically repairs 1 point of ship Hull damage during each Upkeep phase.
on_board_items.sector_permit: Avoids checks and complications when traveling to regulated sectors.
on_board_items.spare_parts: May be automatically expended to repair a weapon that becomes inoperable. Single use.
on_board_items.teach-bot: Automatically grants 1 XP to a random crew member during each Upkeep phase.
on_board_items.transcender: Allows one crew member to gain +1 XP after a battle. Single use.

ship_components.medical_bay: Select a crew member in Sick Bay to mark off 2 turns of recovery time instead of 1.
ship_components.cargo_hold: When traveling, may take on cargo. Roll 2D6 and discard any 5-6s. Earn credits equal to the highest remaining die.
ship_components.database: When traveling to a new world, you may generate two planets and choose which to visit.
ship_components.shuttle: +2 to the roll to flee an invaded planet. Allows Medic to use their ability even if not in the battle.
ship_components.merchant_link: Perform one free Trade action each campaign turn without assigning a crew member.
ship_components.drop_launcher: On an 8+ on 2D6, you may deploy two crew members via drop pod at the end of any round.
ship_components.probe_launcher: When encountering the Asteroids travel event, you may roll twice to avoid the field.
ship_components.auto_turrets: +1 to avoid the Raided travel event. +1 to flee an invaded planet.
ship_components.military_nav_system: Ignore Story Point loss from Navigation Trouble. Combine Travel-Time and Uneventful Trip events.
ship_components.improved_shielding: Reduce all Hull damage sustained by 1 point.
ship_components.hidden_compartment: Roll only once for confiscated items during a Patrol Ship event. Earn extra credits on each trip.
ship_components.suspension_pod: Suspend up to 4 crew members. They do not require Upkeep or participate in events.
ship_components.living_quarters: Your crew size counts as two members less for the purpose of Upkeep costs.
ship_components.military_fuel_converters: Starship travel costs are reduced by 2 credits.

strange_characters_rules.deconverted_innate_armor: Has a 6+ Armor Saving Throw due to built-in plating.
strange_characters_rules.deconverted_implants: Can be fitted with up to 3 implants.
strange_characters_rules.deconverted_savvy_cap: Their Savvy score can never be improved.
strange_characters_rules.unity_agent_favor: Each campaign turn, you may roll 2D6. On a 10-12, you can either remove a Rival, gain a Quest Rumor, or gain a Patron. On a 2-4, you must travel to the next planet immediately. If you are unable to do so, lose this trait permanently.
strange_characters_rules.mysterious_past_roll: Roll twice on the Background Table and apply both results. Ignore any bonus story points from creation rolls.
strange_characters_rules.hakshan_motivation: Automatically has the Truth motivation in addition to any other rolled.
strange_characters_rules.stalker_teleport: May teleport 1D6” as an Alternative Movement option.
strange_characters_rules.hulker_shooting: When shooting, Combat Skill is always treated as +0.
strange_characters_rules.hulker_traits: Ignores the Clumsy and Heavy traits on weapons.
strange_characters_rules.hopeful_rookie_bonus: Begins with 1 Luck and gains +1 bonus XP every game they do not become a casualty.
strange_characters_rules.hopeful_rookie_loss: The first time they become a casualty, they lose all Luck points permanently and no longer receive bonus XP.
strange_characters_rules.genetic_uplift_penalty: All Background rolls that would result in additional credits are ignored. The crew receives 1 additional Rival.
strange_characters_rules.mutant_tasks: Cannot be sent to perform Recruit or Find a Patron tasks.
strange_characters_rules.assault_bot_savvy: Savvy is +0 and cannot be upgraded.
strange_characters_rules.manipulator_brawl: Cannot enter a Brawl voluntarily. May fire 2 Pistols in the same round, at separate targets.
strange_characters_rules.manipulator_sp: When the crew earns story points, roll 1D6 for each Manipulator. Each 6 grants a bonus story point.
strange_characters_rules.primitive_shooting: Cannot benefit from gun sights or fire above 8” range.
strange_characters_rules.primitive_melee: All Melee weapons count as Elegant.
strange_characters_rules.feeler_motivation: Roll twice on the Motivation Table and receive the benefits of both.
strange_characters_rules.emo_suppressed_loyalty: Will never voluntarily leave the crew and may ignore events that would cause fights. Can never receive Luck points.
strange_characters_rules.minor_alien_resources: If character creation rolls grant bonus credits or story points, reduce the final increase by 1.
strange_characters_rules.minor_alien_xp: The XP cost for one random ability score is reduced by 1.
strange_characters_rules.traveler_flee: Speed is +2” if moving directly away from a visible enemy.
strange_characters_rules.traveler_event: After every battle, roll 2D6. On a 2, they disappear (+2 SP). On an 11-12, the crew immediately receives a Quest.
strange_characters_rules.empath_tasks: When sent on Recruit or Find a Patron tasks, add +1 to the roll.
strange_characters_rules.empath_implants: Cannot be given implants without losing this ability.
strange_characters_rules.bio_upgrade_implants: May have up to 4 implants, and could benefit from 2 of the same implant.
strange_characters_rules.bio_upgrade_credits: If character creation rolls produce bonus credits, receive 2 credits less.
